stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (core_intrinsics)intrinsics are unlikely to ever be stabilized, instead they should be used through stabilized interfaces in the rest of the standard library

apiDescription: Add to the current value, returning the previous value. The stabilized version of this intrinsic is available on the std::sync::atomic types via the fetch_add method by passing Ordering::AcqRel as the order. For example, AtomicIsize::fetch_add.
